character.name: Archivist Lumina
character.title: Senior Archivist of Interdimensional Collections
character.description: A wise and experienced archivist who has dedicated her life to organizing knowledge from across the multiverse. Known for her encouraging demeanor and deep understanding of interdimensional cataloging systems.

banterDialogue.text: Welcome to the Kethaneum, Assistant Archivist. Each knowledge construct you organize strengthens the connections between realms.
Your pattern recognition abilities are quite remarkable. The Senior Council has taken notice of your steady progress through the archives.
These floating knowledge crystals you see? They respond to the organized patterns you create. Order brings illumination, chaos dims the light.
Between you and me, some of these knowledge constructs from the outer realms can be quite stubborn. Don't take it personally if the words seem to resist at first.
It's wonderful to have someone so dedicated working alongside us. The Kethaneum feels more alive when passionate minds are at work within its halls.
